basics.name: Hoai-Nham Le
basics.summary: I'm a Software Engineer, specialized in Site Reliability Engineering. I've been helping organizations build great products since 2014. Most of my free time is spent learning new technologies. I have a huge passion for Linux and the open source community.

work.summary: Employment Hero is a software that helps small and medium Australian businesses manage HR, payroll, employee engagement and benefits.
highlights: Build K8S based infrastructure on AWS for microservices.
Build CI/CD pipelines using CircleCI, Flux, Helm.
Build observability platform using Prometheus, Opsgenie, LogDNA, and Jaeger tracing.
Build in-house tools to manage, automate and optimize infrastructure using shell script, Ruby and Golang.
Manage centralized logging system built upon ELK, using filebeat agents to collect logs from multiple sources
Platform governance: API gateway, service mesh, Postgresql, Redis, Kafka, etc.

work.summary: Misfit is an American consumer electronics company specializing in wearable technology that utilizes sensors and home automation products. Misfit then was acquired by Fossil Group in late 2015.
highlights: Plan and build AWS based infrastructure for backend team
Kubernetes the hard way on AWS using kops, plan and migrate system running on AWS ECS to K8S without downtime
Deploy, manage and stablize many services on kubernetes like graylog2, elasticsearch, kafka, prometheus, sentry
Monitor kubernetes and services using prometheus and grafana, get notified via telegram or slack
Manage centralized logging system built upon ELK, using filebeat agents to collect logs from multiple sources
Build in-house tools to manage, automate and optimize infrastructure using shell script, python and golang
Plan, design and create CI/CD process for development team using Jenkins, Bitbucket pipelines and Kubernetes

work.summary: Posiba is an information service for the social sector dedicated to helping those working for public good make greater positive impact.
highlights: Manage linux instances on AWS using puppet.
Monitor infrastructure components using zabbix, get notified via telegram.
Collect system and application logs using fluentd, elasticsearch and kibana.
Build in-house devops tools using shell script and python.
Help developers to roll out projects using devops tools: puppet, jenkins, docker.

work.summary: FPT Telecom is one of biggest ISPs in Vietnam.
highlights: Build and monitor linux systems and network devices using icinga2 and cacti.
Manage linux servers with many roles: DNS clusters, email gateway, monitoring servers, etc.
Develop ansible playbooks to manage multiple linux servers.
Guard against local users via squid proxy, analyze http traffic through ELK to spot suspicious behaviors
Build, manage and backup VMware ESXi.
